{"language":"python","parent":["conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
cur = conn.cursor()
cur.execute('SELECT * FROM todo')
rows = cur.fetchall()
todo_list = []
for row in rows:
    todo = Todo(id=row[0],task=row[1],isAchieved=row[2] == 1,created_at=row[3])
    todo_list.append(todo)
conn.commit()
cur.close()
conn.close()"],"caption":[]}

{"language":"python","parent":["def get_todo():
    conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
    cur = conn.cursor()
    cur.execute('SELECT * FROM todo')
    rows = cur.fetchall()
    conn.commit()
    cur.close()
    conn.close()
    return rows"],"caption":[]}

{"icon":{"type":"external","external":{"url":"https://www.notion.so/icons/code_gray.svg"}},"color":"default_background","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"fetch_todo関数","href":null}]}

{"language":"python","parent":["def fetch_todo():
		# データを取得
    ","rows = gate.get_todo()","
    todo_list = []
    for row in rows:
        todo = Todo(id=row[0],task=row[1],isAchieved=row[2] == 1,created_at=row[3])
        todo_list.append(todo)
    controls = []
    for todo in todo_list:
        text = ft.Text(todo.task)
        checkbox = ft.Checkbox(on_change=lambda e, isAchieved=todo.isAchieved, id=todo.id:check_todo(e, isAchieved,id))
        if todo.isAchieved:
            text.style = ft.TextStyle(decoration=ft.TextDecoration.LINE_THROUGH)
            checkbox.value = todo.isAchieved
        controls.append(
            ft.Row([
                checkbox,
                text,
                ft.IconButton(icon=ft.icons.DELETE,on_click=lambda e,id=todo.id: delete_todo(e, id))
            ]))
    todo_list_control.controls = controls
    page.update()"],"caption":[]}

{"language":"python","parent":["def create_todo(e, task):
    conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
    cur = conn.cursor()
    cur.execute('INSERT INTO todo(task) VALUES (?)',(task,))
    conn.commit()
    cur.close()
    conn.close()
    page.go("/")"],"caption":[]}

{"language":"python","parent":["def delete_todo(e, id):
    conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
    cur = conn.cursor()
    cur.execute('DELETE FROM todo WHERE id = ?',(id,))
    conn.commit()
    cur.close()
    conn.close()

{"language":"python","parent":["def check_todo(e, isAchieved, id):
    if isAchieved:
        isAchieved = 0
    else:
        isAchieved = 1
    conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
    cur = conn.cursor()
    cur.execute('UPDATE todo SET isAchieved = ? WHERE id = ?',(isAchieved, id))
    conn.commit()
    cur.close()
    conn.close()
    fetch_todo()"],"caption":[]}
